title: Cruel Enchantment
description: View our feature on Anya Bastâ€™s Cruel Enchantment.The Dark Magick series continues from this New York Times bestselling author.   To keep her fae race from being eradicated, Emmaline Gallagher must retrieve an object of fae power from a locked ancient box. Only Aeric O'Malley has the forging skills to create a key. But will their tumultuous past stand in the way?
author: Anya Bast
